  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3552</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3552</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La gralla i el tabal</string>
            <string language="en">Oboe and drum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oboe und Trommel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oboe et tambour</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oboe e cilindro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oboe e tamburo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Oboe και τύμπανο</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs didàctic interactiu que presenta la gralla i el tabal, els instruments que acompanyen l'execució dels "castellers" en l'aixecament i culminació de torres humanes, expressió típica del folklore popular català.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive teaching unit on the "gralla" (a kind of antique soprano oboe) and a "tabal" (a type of drum); two instruments that accompany the "castellers" as they build their "castells" (human towers)  a typical element in Catalan folklore.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cultura popular</string>
            <string language="en">folk culture</string>
            <string language="es">cultura popular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
            <string language="es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">audició musical</string>
            <string language="en">music listening</string>
            <string language="es">audición musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Maßeinheit auf dem 
"gralla" (eine Art antikes Soprano oboe) und einem "tabal" (ein Typ 
Trommel); zwei Instrumente, die die "castellers", wie sie ihre 
"castells" aufbauen (menschliche Aufsätze) - ein typisches Element in
der katalanischen Folklore begleiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unité d'enseignement interactive sur le "gralla" 
(un genre d'oboe antique de soprano) et un "tabal" (un type de 
tambour) ; deux instrument qui accompagnent les "castellers" 
comme ils établissent leurs "castells" (les tours humaines) - un 
élément typique dans le folklore catalan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando interativa no "gralla" (um tipo 
do oboe antique do soprano) e em um "tabal" (um tipo de cilindro); 
dois instrumento que acompanham os "castellers" como constroem 
seus "castells" (as torres humanas) - um elemento típico no folklore 
catalan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unità d'istruzione interattiva "sul gralla" (un 
genere di oboe antico del soprano) e "su un tabal" (un tipo di 
tamburo); due strumento che accompagnano "i castellers" come 
sviluppano i loro "castells" (torrette umane) - un elemento tipico nel
folclore catalan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μονάδα διδασκαλίας στο "gralla" (ένα 
είδος παλαιού soprano oboe) και "έναν tabal" (ένας τύπος
τυμπάνου)  δύο όργανα που συνοδεύουν τα "castellers" 
δεδομένου ότι χτίζουν "τα castells τουσ" (ανθρώπινοι πύργοι) -
ένα χαρακτηριστικό στοιχείο στην καταλανική λαογραφία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Volkskultur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikhören</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">culture folklorique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écoute de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cultura popular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escutar da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">coltura piega</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ascoltare di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λαϊκός πολιτισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άκουσμα μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
